content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the authority for upcoming author exhibitions or programs at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. However, I can advise that you browse the museum's website or social media handles for information on any upcoming author exhibitions or events that fit your interests or preferences. You can also sign up for the museum's newsletters or follow them on social media platforms to stay updated on new programs and events. Alternately, you could check out the museum's calendar of events, which is available on their website, for an overview of all upcoming programs and events.
